title: Object - Convertible Conversion Transaction
description: Records the conversion of an existing stock security into one or more new securities, specifying the quantity converted and resulting security identifiers.

balance_security_id.description: Identifier for the convertible that holds the remainder balance (for partial conversions)

trigger_id.description: What is the id of the convertible's conversion trigger that resulted in this conversion

capitalization_definition.description: If this conversion event and its `quantity_converted` value was based on the company's capitalization, please specify what stock classes, stock plans and securities were aggregated to calculate the capitalization value used in the calculation (e.g. if it was based on "fully diluted" capitalization, please provide details on how this was calculated using the capitalization type datastructure).
